DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: A name used to identify or qualify the constraint aggregation.

DocAttribute.Name: Description
DocAttribute.Documentation: A description that may apply additional information about a constraint aggregation.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatingConstraint
DocAttribute.Documentation: Constraint to which the other Constraints are associated.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedConstraints
DocAttribute.Documentation: Constraints that are aggregated in using the LogicalAggregator.

DocAttribute.Name: LogicalAggregator
DocAttribute.Documentation: Enumeration that identifies the logical type of aggregation.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR11
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The instance to which the relation RelatingConstraint points shall not be the same as the RelatedConstraint.
